mockery.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when someone laughs at someone or something or shows that they think they are stupid
mockery.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: There was a hint of mockery in his voice.
mockery.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that is completely useless or ineffective
mockery.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She said that the trial had been a mockery.
